title: National Briefing  South: Florida: Immigrant Hid In Jet's Wheel Well
body:
A stowaway from the Dominican Republic was discovered emerging from the wheel well of a passenger jet after it 
landed at Miami International Airport, officials said. The man, whose name was not released, was taken into 
custody by Customs and Border Protection agents for interviews and processing for repatriation, immigration 
officials said. He was not injured. An American Airlines ramp employee saw him climb out of the right wheel well 
around 11:30 a.m., shortly after the plane arrived from Santo Domingo. Customs officials and American Airlines 
security workers tried to determine how security measures were breached for the flight of 1 hour and 40 minutes.

http://www.nytimes.com
